name: A cylinder of blue jasper <inert>
data: It increases the users hitpoints poorly.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'inner strength'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
